decks.notes: The main theme of this deck is to quickly mill cards into the graveyard with cards like Entomb and Brainstorm in order to reanimate powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty. The deck also includes cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With the ability to quickly fill the graveyard and bring back game-changing creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and disrupt their strategy to secure victory.

The primary strategy of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures and tempo plays. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, you can disrupt your opponent's plans before they have a chance to develop. Delver of Secrets and Murktide Regent provide a quick clock, while cards like Fatal Push and Nihil Spellbomb help to control the board. Utilizing a mix of disruption, removal, and threats, this deck aims to maintain control of the game while steadily chipping away at the opponent's life total.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, then play disruptive creatures like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to shut down opponent's mana base. The deck also utilizes aggressive creatures like Pyrogoyf and Fury to quickly finish off the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Sundering Eruption and Shatterskull Smashing provides additional removal and reach to the deck. Overall, the strategy focuses on locking down the opponent's resources while pushing for a fast, aggressive win.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers. It aims to slow down the opponent's actions with cards like Standstill and Timeless Dragon, while efficiently dealing with threats using cards like Swords to Plowshares and Supreme Verdict. The deck also utilizes land destruction with Wasteland and tempo advantage with Teferi, Time Raveler. By disrupting the opponent's game plan and generating card advantage, this deck aims to outvalue the opponent and eventually win the game with its powerful spells and planeswalker abilities.
